name: Farty Party Kids Babysitter
description:
How much do you know about childcare? Do you think you have what it takes to be a good mommy or a babysitter or a nanny? Adorable babies are not newborns anymore, their mommy and daddy put them into daycare to you as they have to go for a party, so you will be their babysitter or nanny & have to keep the mommy & daddy’s little princess busy and interested for a while. But keeping the messy kids busy while doing house chores is just half way, leaving them play and making sure they will learn something from it and also have fun in the same time, this is what makes an experienced babysitter & nanny. Crazy Baby Girl Daycare is a fun game in which you will be nanny or babysitter, you will get to learn all kinds of new stuff about caring, bathing, manicure, and more about taking care of little kids! Crazy Baby Girl Daycare provides you the best opportunity to learn about the babysitting. Crazy Baby Girl Daycare is a very simple game with very cute babies.

It's your first day at the Crazy Baby Girl Daycare and you're in charge of caring for these cute and messy babies by giving them exactly what they need. In Crazy Baby Girl Daycare you'll need to feed the messy babies, change their diaper and play with messy babies to make sure they don't start crying. Enjoy babysitter madness as a nanny, show the real baby care and have tons of funny activities with the little kids like cooking breakfast in kitchen, making kids food, kids feeding and caring. The adorable girl is now at your disposal at Crazy Baby Girl Daycare and needs attention & care. In Crazy Baby Girl Daycare you can practice all the stuffs related to kids in a very educational way. It is the best babysitter mania game in town filled with joy, happiness, madness & craziness!

Crazy Baby Girl Daycare Features:
* Stop the messy kids before they mess up the room.
* Clean up the messy room and decorate it.
* Make a delicious cake for the messy crazy mania kids in the kitchen.
* Give the messy kids a warm bubble bath, pop bubbles, wash hair and create a cute hairstyle!
* Keep things nice and tidy in your daycare house.
* Do the laundry and iron clothes!
* Keep the house clean too - vacuum the rooms and scrub the carpets!
* Tuck the twins in bed, be the best babysitter ever.
